Anime School Girl Uniform Bundle (Female)
kDesc
One of many variations of an anime school girl outfit. Bundle includes hair, jacket, skirt, and shoes. [#Legal]
Une variation sur le thème de l'uniforme d'écolière japonaise. Ce pack comprend une coiffure, une veste, une jupe et des chaussures. [#Legal]
Eine der vielen Variationen des Anime-Schulmädchen-Outfits. Im Paket enthalten sind Haare, Jacke, Rock und Schuhe. [#Legal]
Una delle molteplici varianti della tenuta da studentessa stile Anime. Il pacchetto include acconciatura, giacca, gonna e scarpe. [#Legal]
Una de las muchas variaciones del uniforme de colegiala anime. El conjunto comprende peinado, chaqueta, falda y zapatos. [#Legal]
애니메이션에 등장하는 여학생 스타일 복장입니다. 이 세트는 헤어스타일, 재킷, 스커트, 그리고 신발을 포함합니다. [#Legal]
One of many variations of an anime school girl outfit. Bundle includes hair, jacket, skirt, and shoes. [#Legal]
多款動漫女學生校服之一。本服裝組包括髮型、外套、短裙及鞋。[#Legal]
多款動漫女學生校服之一。本服裝組包括髮型、外套、短裙及鞋。[#Legal]
One of many variations of an anime school girl outfit. Bundle includes hair, jacket, skirt, and shoes. [#Legal]
